Definition: Valid business day in specified business centers
Common Usage: Most common for payments and settlements
Description: Count only days when banks and financial markets are open

Definition: Any calendar day including weekends and holidays
Description: Count all days including weekends and holidays
Business day in the primary financial center for a currency
Days when a specific exchange is open for trading

Definition: Scheduled trading day (may differ from actual)
Description: Days when trading is scheduled (regardless of actual trading)
